description.raw: While trying to examine the object lifecycle and ownership patterns in gazebo, I realized that I didn't understand the `gazebo::event` classes used for generating callback functions in response to triggered events. So I studied it for a while and wrote this document based on my current understanding. I've also noticed a few things that could be changed, which are noted and may lead to gazebo pull requests.

title.raw: Document design of gazebo::event callback classes
